ygData.subject: Re: Slam vs. Bash
ygData.msgSnippet: Hail Evil Dark One! The slam us big folk get is not trainable until we get the bash skill at level 9 (or whatever level we get it now) which I thought was kind
ygData.messageBody:
Hail Evil Dark One!

The slam us big folk get is not trainable until we get the
bash skill at level 9 (or whatever level we get it now) which
I thought was kind of strange. I kept trying to use it from
level 1 to 5 (when I received kick) and it never raised one
point. At level 9, I put a few points in Bash and low and
behold! My slam also worked (they both operate on the
same skill, just one requires a shield).

Angarth, Clan Anstruther, Warrior of the 15th Tier
"Periissem ni periisem"

> ----------
> From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 9:56 AM
> To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] Slam vs. Bash
>
> From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
>
> slam is an inate ability of you big folk, Barbarians, Trolls, Ogres. Bash
> you need a sheild for and is a trainable skill for warrior types.
>
> Salr D'Taynkk
> Dark Warrior of The Kith
> Veeshan
>
> >>> "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...> 5.18.99 8:10:49 AM >>>
> From: "Patricia Halas" <patty_halas@...>
>
> What is the difference between Slam and Bash? I have been bashing
> everyone
> like crazy trying to get it up to the same level as my kick, and now I
> find
> out that I might be wasting my time. I am a Barbarian Princess, so
> slamming
> people around is right in my league, but just what is the difference?
>
> For the Honor and Glory of Rellos Zek;
>
> Patty of Halas
> username: Patricia
> server: Bristlebane
